column4: when Hoary is stable I probably already is in the middle of a grumpy upgrade :P
r u facing issues with the new nautilus?
what issues?
nah, the only serious problems i've had today was the lockups caused by the 2.6.10-4 kernel
since when do you have these nautilus problems?
my last dist-upgrade both contained the new kernel and new nautilus
could be the kernel then...
i see... oh well... i'm sure it will be fixed soon
total freeze at gnome login...
yes
try booting with the .3 kernel
that should get you back to normal for now
you don't trust resume? :)
yeah... easy way to test it it's because of the kernel or gnome
not when i'm downloading full speed and i'm 90% done LOL
hehe. I get lousy speeds with BT. I'm behind a huge NAT that i can't do anything about
ouch.. that sucks... i know latest BT versions should improve performances behind NAT if i'm not wrong
well...the internal network is jammed with wormtraffic and porn leechers
that sucks :( not referred to porn LOL
you can edit the /etc/cups/cupsd.conf to fit your needs
i think i'll try that :)
